heading: HB05657
0: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE MAGNA CARTA OF YOUNG FARMERS
status: Pending with the Committee on AGRICULTURE AND FOOD since 2017-05-17
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05657
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE MAGNA CARTA OF YOUNG FARMERS
ABSTRACT : Declares “Young Farmer” as an individual whose primary source of income comes from agriculture, with an age range of 15-35 years old, is owner, worker, tenant or lessee of the land in which they personally cultivate and till; Aims to promote the social and economic well-being of these young farmers; develop their skills and capabilities; and eliminate discrimination against them by promoting their rights.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : DE VENECIA, CHRISTOPHER V.P.
DATE FILED : 2017-05-16
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
